definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Liquid rosin resin is made from the gum rosin through esterification with polylol.
sentences.chinese: 液體松香脂由松香與多元醇酯化而成。

sentences.english: During the study, researchers recorded the width of the tree rings of balsam firs .
sentences.chinese: 通過這個研究，研究者記錄下香脂冷杉的年輪的寬度。

sentences.english: Put the cream on with your fingers and then gently smooth it in.
sentences.chinese: 用手指把香脂抹上，然後，輕輕地把它塗均勻。

sentences.english: The fruity notes flow over a blend of amber, vanilla, myrrh and rare balms.
sentences.chinese: 水果調協調琥珀，香草，沒藥和香脂。

sentences.english: This cream is best applied to the face at night.
sentences.chinese: 這種香脂最好晚上抹臉用。

sentences.english: The sight of their joie de vivre is beaume which soothes the pain of loneliness.
sentences.chinese: 他們的生活樂趣，是香脂的視線撫慰孤獨的痛苦。

definition: Styrax officinalis or Styrax benzoin/benzoin resin (used in TCM)/Benzoinum
snowdrop bush (Styrax officinalis)/gum storax, used in TCM
